channel.title: Help with 508's
channel.description: Hey guys, how do you make an admin or an owner status on a 508? bc i go to bin/data/characters and a .DAT file shows up... and i dont know how to make an admin with it.. please help me :)

item.title: Help with 508's
item.dc:creator: @iamthegod iamthegod
item.description:
@iamthegod wrote:

I see, but I just do the Login.Java method

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 508's
item.dc:creator: @My_name_is_anthony My name is anthony
item.description:
@My_name_is_anthony wrote:

Usally its decrypted so just do open with notepad and search rights then change to 2, if it dosnt work try again.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 508's
item.dc:creator: @Valance Valance
item.description:
@Valance wrote:

Open the .dat file with Wordpad, not notepad, and change rights from 0 to 2.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 508's
item.dc:creator: @iamthegod iamthegod
item.description:
@iamthegod wrote:

Lol thats not hard.
It should normally look like…

} if (p.username.equals("NAME")) { p.rights = ?; }
you make it so it’s like…

} if (p.username.equals("NAME")) { p.rights = ?; } if (p.username.equals("NAME")) { p.rights = ?; } if (p.username.equals("NAME")) { p.rights = ?; } if (p.username.equals("NAME")) { p.rights = ?; } if (p.username.equals("NAME")) { p.rights = ?; }

Well thats what it would look like for my server’s Login.java, im using Bulby’s 508.
The the code just keeps going on for others in Login.java

btw Rngu4fun that mostly works for 317’s, because the player mainsaves are .dat files and will say stuff like
$@&#!$#%^^*!FRGTFC!^^!%*I!BX!
AKA Random Jibberish

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 508's
item.dc:creator: @Killer86 Killer86
item.description:
@Killer86 wrote:

ok well glad i made u laugh now ur gunna prolly crap ur self… now what if i wanna make more than 1 do i just copy and paste that string nd make another person with rights?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 508's
item.dc:creator: @Rngu4fun Rngu4fun
item.description:
@Rngu4fun wrote:

[quote=“iamthegod, post:2, topic:345239”]LOL!!!
THIS IS WHERE U GO!
Bulby(or pali, whatever source your using)/io(or rs2 or rs2hd)/Login.Java

There you find the owner of the server

ctrl + f
“bulby”
"palidino
or whatever the name of the server owner’s name is
roflmao thanks for the laugh
but glad to help

EDIT:
Whoopssss forgot
you should see
if(p.username.Equals “BLAHBLAHBLAH”)
then p.rights = 2
rights 0 = normal player
rights 1 = mod
rights 2 = admin
replace the name thats there with your desired username and login like that
also make the name lowercase or else it may not work like for my server I first tried Xeno then I tried xeno and it worked.
gl and hf[/quote]

There is a easy way,go to characters then mainsaves,and find ur name change the p rights to 2 and save,this way u dont have to compile

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @iamthegod iamthegod
item.description:
@iamthegod wrote:

LOL!!!
THIS IS WHERE U GO!

EDIT:
Whoopssss forgot
you should see
if(p.username.Equals “BLAHBLAHBLAH”)
then p.rights = 2
rights 0 = normal player
rights 1 = mod
rights 2 = admin
replace the name thats there with your desired username and login like that
also make the name lowercase or else it may not work like for my server I first tried Xeno then I tried xeno and it worked.
